categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Erle Hovlinn was a male individual who served as a Lieutenant Colonel in the Imperial Army of the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War. Lieutenant Colonel Hovlinn was stationed on the Blood Ambition, the flagship of a task force under the command of Captain Ralchio Nervi, and led its complement of ground forces. Hovlinn and his forces participated in the Battle of Xorrn.
